info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:01PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garfield County through 745 PM MDT... At 700 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Red Canyon, or 28 miles south of Junction, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panguitch, Antimony, Red Canyon and Hillsdale. This includes the following highways... US Route 89 between mile markers 124 and 130. Utah Route 12 between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
